concept.title: Notification setup
concept.shortdesc: sets up the player for basic notifications, although you must complete the same set up for your custom notifications.

conbody.p:
There are two implementations for PTNotification:
To listen
To add custom notifications to PTNotificationHistory
To listen to notifications,
instantiates the PTNotification class and attaches it to an instance of the
PTMediaPlayerItem, which is attached to a PTMediaPlayer instance. There is only one PTNotificationHistory instance per PTMediaPlayer.
conbody.note: If you are adding customizations, your applications and not , must perform those steps.
